reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique room types and specific high-value features. Desc_1 (Living/Dining) and Desc_4 (Bedroom with AC/Balcony) were easily matched to Image_1 and Image_4, respectively. Desc_2 (Kitchen) was confirmed by the presence of the central island and appliance cabinet in Image_2. Desc_5 (High-end Bathroom) was uniquely identified by the freestanding bathtub and modern dark tiling in Image_5. The remaining two standard bathrooms (Image_3 and Image_6) were differentiated based on subtle cues: Image_3 appeared slightly more compact, aligning with Desc_3's '空間偏緊湊' tag. Image_6's mirror reflection showed a distinct framed opening, which was interpreted as supporting Desc_6's '雙門動線' (double door access) tag.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows a combined living and dining area with installed AC, basic furniture (sofa, coffee table, dining set), and clear zone separation.
Image displays an open kitchen layout featuring a central island ('中島廚房'), complete stove setup, and dedicated appliance cabinet space.
Standard bathroom with wet/dry separation (glass enclosure). The tight framing and basic pedestal sink align with the '空間偏緊湊' and '衛浴配備基本齊全' tags.
Bedroom view showing an installed AC unit and a large sliding door/window leading to a potential balcony area, confirming '具陽台空間' and '已裝冷氣'.
High-end bathroom featuring a freestanding bathtub, vessel sink, dark modern tiling, and a spacious layout, matching '高級衛浴配置' and '空間寬敞'.
Standard bathroom with wet/dry separation. The mirror reflection shows a distinct framed doorway, supporting the '雙門動線' (double door access) tag, differentiating it from Image_3.
